headline: Philip Morris International (PM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Philip Morris International on WorldlyInvest’s Substack. As of 2ⁿᵈ July, Philip Morris International’s share was trading at $175.91. PM’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.70 and 24.43 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Russo views Philip Morris International (PM) as one of the most remarkable examples in the author’s […]
